name: Wicked Acolyte Chilam Sabak
desc: If you have 5 or more cards in your hand, you can Normal Summon this card without Tributing. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon this card in Defense Position and treat it as a Tuner monster. You can only use this effect of "Wicked Acolyte Chilam Sabak" once per turn.
